# Dagger
## Overview
A dagger has a blade that is about 1 foot in length. You get a +2 bonus on [[Sleight of Hand (Skill)|Sleight of Hand]] skill checks made to conceal a dagger on your body.


-tx-
| **Simple Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Light Melee Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** | ** Special** |
| | Dagger | 2 gp | 1d3 | 1d4 | 19-20/x2 | 10 ft. | 1 lb. | P or S | â€” |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 146
